title: Can u guys send me my phone back?
content: I have bought a Pixel 3 XL phone, in less than 7 months I have sent Google 3 times for technical problems of the phone, I have paid a lot of money for a phone with a malfunction, it is incredible the commercials they do to that phone but the reality  It is a ðŸ’©... the last time I sent my phone  for a malfunction to you guys was  2 months ago, and i am still waiting!!!! Supposed Google gona send me a new phone I need my phone back. Can u send a email?
